title: GoToAssist (Remote Support)
creator: Citrix Online, a division of Citrix Systems, Inc

extendedInfo.description: Go Mobile with Citrix GoToAssist for Android. Deliver remote technical support directly from your favorite Android device. Instantly connect to computers and solve clientsâ technical issues.  New to GoToAssist Remote Support? Download the free app from Google play and click on "Create Account" at the login screen to provide unlimited live support sessions for free!Already have a GoToAssist Remote Support account? Log in with your existing credentials to access your account and connect to your unattended machines.GoToAssist for Android gives you the freedom to deliver support from anywhere, at any time. Support your customers 24/7 when and where they need help.HOW TO GET STARTED1.) Download the GoToAssist app from Google Play and install on your Android device.2.) Enter your existing GoToAssist credentials.3.) Don't have an account? Tap on "Create Account" at the login screen to get your free account!4.) Once logged in, tap on device screen to create a support session when instructed to and have your user go to www.fastsupport.com and enter the remote support ID for your support session or send them an invitation to connect via email. Your user accepts the connection and you can begin to provide remote support.*****Simpleâ¢ Instantly connect to users and their devices to solve problems quickly by directly controlling their computer with the intuitive multi-touch display.â¢ Start a remote support session directly from your Android device.Convenientâ¢ Provide remote support from your Android device quickly and easily. Once the app is installed, enter your existing account credentials and start a support session.â¢ You can be in the office even when youâre out of the office. With GoToAssist for Android you can connect and resolve technical issues from your favorite Android device to any MacÂ® or PC.Reliableâ¢ GoToAssist for Android comes with free 24/7 Global Customer Support, so youâre never left hanging.â¢ GoToAssist for Android is backed by Citrix, so you can count on this app working when you need it.Featuresâ¢ On-demand remote support (unlimited use from your Android device)â¢ Intuitive touch and gesture controlsâ¢ 400% zoom to see details and operate with precisionâ¢ Multitaskingâ¢ Full keyboard functionality (including special keys Alt, Ctrl, and Tab)â¢ Preview text mode for fast typingâ¢ Works seamlessly with existing firewalls - no need for special configurationâ¢ 128-bit AES encryption, dual passwords and end-to-end user authenticationâ¢ Connects over 3G and Wi-Fiâ¢ Free 24/7 supportREQUIREMENTSThis version of GoToAssist has been certified on the following devices:â¢ Samsung Galaxy S2â¢ Samsung Google Nexus Sâ¢ Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1â¢ Samsung Galaxy SIII â¢ Droid Razrâ¢ HTC Evo 4G â¢ Asus Transformerâ¢ Motorola Xoomâ¢ Droid Bionicâ¢ Droid 4This version of GoToAssist should be compatible with most devices that meet the following general requirements:â¢ Android OS 2.3.3 or newerRemote Computers:â¢ Internet connectionâ¢ WindowsÂ® 7, Vista, 2003 server or XPâ¢ Mac OSÂ® X v10.5 (Leopard) or newerâ¢ Internet ExplorerÂ® 7.0 or newer, FirefoxÂ® 3.5 or newer or Safariâ¢ 3.0 or newerNOTE: To use this free application, you can sign in with your existing GoToAssist Remote Support credentials or tap on "Create Account" at login screen to sign up for a free mobile plan. You will be able to provide unlimited live support with your free mobile plan and the best part is it doesn't expire!

reviews.title: Not a flat screen/fulfill keyboard replacement, but
reviews.comment: with me everywhere but shower. Invaluable for small IT departments.  Control is so fast, I nearly got a Webcam shout of a thief using a laptop after \"snatch and grab\".  He was sitting in front of laptop downloading iTunes when I remoted in. That is fast!
reviews.author: Clinton Lemon III

reviews.title: Keyboard not typing letters in windows...
reviews.comment: I tried the app with samsung galaxy tab 10.1 honeycomb version and ICS version in both versions the keyboard if i want to type an address for example in internet explorer on the remote machine it will not type letters, it will type numbers or symbols but no letters. I then tried it on my Nexus phone ewith ICS and them with Jelly Bean and the same problem persists. So I don\'t think it\'s device specific or OS specific. Eitherwise things work well but the keyboard is a big fail. I even added a US keyboard layo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: It is just the IM portion. Absolutely useless.
reviews.author: Andrew Plymale

reviews.title: 5stars
reviews.comment: Awesome product, best in its class.
reviews.author: Hassan Kadri

reviews.title: Works well except...
reviews.comment: Works fairly well on my Samsung Note II except that the remote display won\'t rotate when I rotate my phone (which makes panning around the remote screen much harder),and although the toolbar is semi-transparent, there needs to be a way to raise it out of the way to free up screen space.
reviews.author: John Ream

reviews.title: Sort of works
reviews.comment: The app generally works though I personally haven\'t found any real use for it. If you\'re on call and have no access to a computer, then this could be handy.   A feature I\'d like to see would be to have the ability to access the service desk to view and update incidents...
reviews.author: Adam Corriveau

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Nexus 7?
reviews.comment: Works great on my old phone...but can\'t use on my tablet running Jelly Bean.
reviews.author: Eric Piazzoni

reviews.title: Viewing unattended PCs logs me off
reviews.comment: Upon logging in, when I choose to view unattended PCs I am logged off of the program...
reviews.author: Robert Parelius

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Hi, it doesn\'t support on samsung galaxy ace.please fix it. Thanks
reviews.author: p pandrala

reviews.title: Terrific
reviews.comment: I have a Asus Prime Tab that works beautifully with this app.  One of the uses is controlling presentation software while speaking making it a universal remote controller for any application.  Very reliable because you are using wi-fi instead of blue tooth or a limited dedicated wireless signal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small window
reviews.comment: Unable to view just one individual monitor on a dual monitor computer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
reviews.comment: Unless you\'re a professional nit-picker, this is great stuff here.  LET \'ER RIP!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Productivity
reviews.comment: This app allows me to keep clients happy without sacrificing having a life. Works great over wifi and 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unattended errors
reviews.comment: I can access unattended computers but it doesn\'t cache the passwords.  I don\'t have access to many of the passwords for my clients login.  The login asks for the password with no option to use the stored password like it does on the PC version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on my Galaxy Tab 10.1
reviews.comment: I could connect to both attended and unattended computers and the app runs stable and smooth on my galaxy tab running under Android 4.0, that\'s great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Service advance
reviews.comment: Amazing! More capabilities than  I would have  imagined.  Of course I can\'t  talk at the same time, but that is the phone\'s fault.
reviews.author: A Google User
